card.name: CW - CCW237 - No extracting judgments with passport numbers

data.text:
@neilbosworth  @gillianoberholzer  @cobuspienaar 

Replacing the ID Number field with the Passport Field when the ID Number field is blank will not be a problem. 

What do we do when the Passport field is blank as well?
What do we do when the Capturers use the Passport field as an extra name field?
Will Experian add validation to mark the ID Number field as and ID or Passport?
When Experian is not happy with the Passport data that will replace the ID Number field, will we need to provide data reports so that they can see the differences?
With all the above mentioned, maybe we should display both fields rather to prevent uncertainty and data discrepancies? Experian would need to cater for the extra field though. 

Please confirm your thoughts.
